```{r}
# Global simulation parameters
batch_size <- 1000
```


## Stochastic Matrix Mixing Time

```{r, echo = F}
set.seed(23)
# Generate a stochastic matrix
P <- RM_stoch(n = 4, symm = T)
P
```

### Epsilon = 0.01

```{r}
# Evolve a batch
sim <- mixtime_sim(P, batch_size, steps = 11, epsilon = 0.01)
# Extract the arrays
batch <- sim[[1]]
evolved_batch <- sim[[2]]
if(bool_loud){head(batch)}
mixtime_histogram(batch, mat = "Stochastic ")
prop_mixed(batch)
```
